stanza.line: When thou shalt be disposed to set me lightlight
And place my merit in the eye of scornscorn
Upon thy side against my self Ill fightfight
And prove thee virtuous though thou art forswornforsworn
With mine own weakness being best acquaintedacquainted
Upon thy part I can set down a storystory
Of faults concealed wherein I am attaintedattainted
That thou in losing me shalt win much gloryglory
And I by this will be a gainer tootoo
For bending all my loving thoughts on theethee
The injuries that to my self I dodo
Such is my love to thee I so belongbelong
That for thy right my self will bear all wrongwrong
